thread.title: Jack Branum

author: Jack Branum
title: Jack Branum
text: I had some problems with the website while trying to place the order. After I placed the order the website kept kicking me out telling me my cart was empty and all my items were gone. So I researched everything again to find the items I wanted but the same problem would repeat. So I tried again and only ordered about half the original number of items but the problem persisted. So I gave up. The next day I received an email wanting me to complete the order so I did and it worked but I was down to only three items so that is all I purchased.
